job_details.degree_required: Bachelor's in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related field

jd: From: Nikhil Ashutosh, vyzeinc nashutosh@vyzeinc.com Reply to: nashutosh@vyzeinc.com Job Description -Title: Project Manager (Network)Location: New York City, NY (Hybrid) local preferredDuration: 12+ MonthsOnly USC and GC“Need 3 references” Job Description:- A minimum of three (3) years of experience in program or project management, specifically in network infrastructure deployment in a new construction environment. Greater consideration will be given to proposers who have experience in healthcare or health lab environments.- A bachelor's degree in information technology, Computer Science, or a related field. o PMP, PMI, or related project management certifications are a plus. o Cisco Certified Network Associate (CCNA) or other relevant network certifications are a plus. - A proven ability to manage budgets and financial aspects of projects, with experience in new construction projects and/or healthcare budgeting a plus.- A minimum of three (3) years of experience in IT network architecture, protocols, and best practices, with an understanding of the unique requirements of health lab facilities.- Experience working with network infrastructure, vendors, contractors, and specialized healthcare equipment providers.- Proficiency in project management tools and software, including salesforce project tracker, MS Project, and Visio.- Excellent organizational and leadership skills.- Effective communication skills and interpersonal abilities.- Must be able to work both on-site and, if needed, remotely.
